submission:
import sortedcontainers
class Solution:
    def shortestDistanceAfterQueries(self, n: int, queries: List[List[int]]) -> List[int]:
        sl = sortedcontainers.SortedList()
        next = {}
        curr = n-1
        ans = []
        for a,b in queries:
            i = sl.bisect_left(a)
            if i == len(sl) or sl[i] > a:
                i -= 1
            if i >= 0 and next[sl[i]] >= b:
                ans.append(curr)
                continue
            i = sl.bisect_left(a)
            while i < len(sl) and a <= sl[i] < b:
                c = sl.pop(i)
                d = next.pop(c)
                curr += d-c-1
            sl.add(a)
            next[a] = b
            curr -= b-a-1
            ans.append(curr)
        return ans
